summary: White-label clone maker testing complete. All 5 features verified: (1) Landing page displays dynamic app name 'My Dammaiguda' and stats from config, (2) Dashboard shows dump yard widget with config values, (3) AQI widget shows 'Dammaiguda' and 'Hyderabad' from config.aqi.stations, (4) Side menu dynamically shows Dump Yard based on features.dumpYard: true, (5) Login flow works with test credentials 9876543210/123456
passed_tests: Landing Page: App name 'My Dammaiguda' visible (from config.branding.appName)
Landing Page: Tagline 'Track Issues. Protect Health. Claim Benefits.' visible (from config.area.tagline)
Landing Page: 'Our Commitment to Dammaiguda' shows area name (from config.area.name)
Landing Page: Dump Yard card visible (from config.features.dumpYard: true)
Login Flow: Get Started > Phone 9876543210 > OTP 123456 > Verify > Dashboard redirect
Dashboard: Dump Yard widget visible (data-testid='dumpyard-widget', features.dumpYard: true)
Dashboard: Dump Yard shows 'JAWAHAR NAGAR' (from config.dumpYard.name)
Dashboard: Dump Yard shows '10,000 tonnes/day' (from config.dumpYard.dailyWasteTons)
Side Menu: App name 'My Dammaiguda' in header
Side Menu: Dump Yard menu item visible (features.dumpYard: true)
Side Menu: Air Quality menu item visible (features.aqi: true)
Side Menu: Fitness menu item visible (features.fitness: true)

hooks_tested.useLocalizedConfig: Returns localized strings based on language (en/te)
hooks_tested.useDumpYardConfig: Returns config.dumpYard for dump yard details

critical_code_review_comments: appConfig.js: Well-structured white-label config with AREA_PRESETS for multiple areas
AppConfigContext.jsx: Good hook pattern with useFeatureFlags, useLocalizedConfig for conditional rendering
LandingPage.jsx uses useLocalizedConfig(language) for i18n support
Dashboard.jsx correctly checks both features.dumpYard AND config.dumpYard?.enabled before showing widget
Layout.jsx menu items filtered by feature flags - clean implementation
seed_data_creation: None needed - using existing test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: White-label architecture fully implemented and tested. Config located at /app/frontend/src/config/appConfig.js with AREA_PRESETS for 7 areas. Only Dammaiguda has dumpYard: true. Context hooks in /app/frontend/src/context/AppConfigContext.jsx provide useAppConfig, useFeatureFlags, useLocalizedConfig. All conditional rendering working correctly. Test user: 9876543210 with OTP 123456.
